summary: Just my version of Lydia.... love the red head look
descriptionHtml:
Lydia changes
1) Redhead with freckles
2) Now essential & invulnerable 
3) Magica & Health now 100
4) Knows these spells: Flames, Frostbite & Icespike
5) Inventory:
	Ebony Boots
	Ebony Cuirass
	Ebony Gauntlets
	Ebony Helmet
	Ebony Shield
	Ebony War Axe
	100 Ebony Arrows
	Ebony Bow

suggested mods
	ApachiiSkyHair
	Battle Hardened Body Mod Vanilla UNP UNPB UNPC CBBE ADEC
	Covereyes
	Coverwomen
author: nlbain
